post.body: also, you look great with a beard, dude. Not Evil Lilly at all ... well, ok, maybe a li'l bit.
all my presentations are at people.mozilla.org/~beltzner/presentations in PDF and key.zip formats, grab what you need! :)
the Senate must approve any Senate reform; thus, to reform the Senate, one must appoint Senators sympathetic to senate reform.
also, I think Wikipedia counts as an OS project, yeah ... not an OS*S* project, maybe. Oh, mediawiki is OSS, though :)
bittorrent, one could argue a lot of the internet protocols as well, maybe? perhaps too different a category?
imagine styrofoam fluff up to your mid calf. Only make it cold and wet to the touch. Then imagine yourself digging a hole. :)
if you're using Firefox 3.1, the "update" button on twitter.com doesn't work. See bug 470559 on bugzilla.mozilla.org for info
realized that if he played by the rules right now, he'd be in gym.
is prepping an early Christmas Day meal, idly wondering what we'll actually make on the 24th/25th.
did his pushups today: 9-11-8-8-11 (barely)
is realizing that the video author is the one that asked for the ad by being a "sponsored video", withdraws severity of objection.
is reflecting & clarifying: I was disgusted about the lack of relevance to my task & that it took up 1/3rd of the video space.
is wondering if he could somehow tell Google not to index comments, if that would stop blog comment spam.
is on holiday, technically, yet reading bugs, actually.
is a little disgusted with http://www.grabup.com/uploads/29fb52789b83456c2284d44a6d5db795.png
is getting back from a lovely evening at the neighbours' place (despite it being a little Carly Simon heavy at times). Contemplating dinner.
totally fell for the storm's feint this morning. Result: the current squall is extra depressing. Well played, nature. Well played.
is done shoveling for another day - yes, I'm that neighbour who's driveway is done the moment it stops snowing. Enjoy your 5-10cm!
cocks an eyebrow at this Google-ad on @glazman's blog: http://tinyurl.com/73yscd - Flash? in a Google ad? Really? (found: http://is.gd/cNsr)
is wondering when Dale will want to do a first pass on the driveway.
